testcase.name: An administrator can setup email preferences for all APIs in a single category
An administrator can setup email preferences for specific APIs in a single category
An administrator can setup email preferences for all APIs in multiple categories
An administrator can setup email preferences for specific APIs in multiple categories

An administrator can setup email preferences for specific XML APIs in multiple categories

An administrator is unable to setup an email preference with no topics selected
